description: Taku Sekine is said to have fallen into depression after "false" sexual assault allegations.
title: Taku Sekine: Top chef 'takes own life' after assault allegations
title_page: Taku Sekine: Top chef 'takes own life' after assault allegations - BBC News
maintext: "This attack on his honour and his integrity was profound. In a depressive process identified and known to doctors, Taku Sekine lost sight of how he could get out of this surge," the statement said.
